review: Can't open remote to put batteries in
author: Cynthia Alexander

review: The stick works ok however the movies that are "free" with Prime are old as well as the TV offerings. The movies to rent are expensive. I have not figured out how to use the music offered however I fear it will not be "free" either. I am disappointed in this purchase.
author: flo

review: This is a wonderful device, connects to TV via HDMI, easy connection to Wi-Fi. Menu interface is intuitive. Access to all my Prime info. This has become our primary source for "tv watching". I recommend this to everyone.
author: Edwin S.  Smith

review: Had to keep loading during programs. I returned it. I wish it did better because I really liked the controller and how easy it was to access.
author: Debbe Hissong

review: I ordered this primarily for the office television that doesn't have access to movies otherwise so the kids could access Netflix and Amazon Prime from the tv they share in that room.  However, it will be convenient for traveling with as well.  This was well worth purchasing.
author: Amanda Johnson

review: This is the third one I have bought. My young kids love watching their shows in their own room. Great parental controls. Awesome product!
author: Sam Irwin
